author: Jared Malsin
title: Egyptian President’s Allies Move to Extend His Time in Office
text:
CAIRO—Egyptian President Abdel Fattah Al Sisiwon a crushing electoral victory, according to official results released Monday. Now, his allies are looking for ways to extend his term in office beyond the current legal limit. 

Some of Mr. Sisi’s supporters say keeping him in office would guarantee stability at a pivotal moment for the Arab world’s largest nation. The Egyptian government is grappling with an Islamic State insurgency in the Sinai Peninsula, and it’s trying to breathe life into the economy, where an estimated third...
